title: UP will give triple talaq to SP, Cong and BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi | assembly-elections$uttarpradesh-2017 | Hindustan Times
text:
UP will give triple talaq to SP, Cong and BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi assembly elections Updated: Feb 05, 2017 00:54 IST Lucknow President of the All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen, Asaduddin Owaisi(PTI File Photo) 
Uttar Pradesh will give “triple talaq” to Samajwadi Party, Congress and Bahujan Samaj Party, Muslim leader Asaduddin Owaisi on Saturday said, dubbing Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Uttar Pradesh chief minister Akhilesh Yadav “two sides of the same coin”. 
“There is no difference between Modi and Akhilesh... Both make a fool of people in the name of development... Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq... to SP, Congress and BSP,” the president of the All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen (AIMIM)said at an event organised by a news channel in Lucknow. 
The AIMIM leader said Muslims accepted Mulayam, Akhilesh and Rajiv Gandhi as their leaders but “they betrayed the community... It is because of their cowardice, injustice and negligence that I had to come in front of you today.” 
Read |Opportunist or rockstar? Owaisi recasting Muslim politics in India 
He said Samajwadi Party had promised to ensure the release of Muslim youths framed in terror cases but nothing had been done in this regard. 
On the issue of “triple talaq”, he said: “Why the Modi government keeps harping on it? Why do not they talk about Zakia Jafri and Akhlaq who was killed in Dadri... This government is being run on hollow promises.”
